divs: Sighting Detailswife and i had planned our vacation to myrtle beach.we had booked a week at sands ocean resort.i go to the website to checkout the resort where we were going to stay.the indoor pool has a sky cam that points north over the beach.it shows loops of the beach.the loop it was showing showed a black sphere coming into view from the south it traveled north to about midway of the camera and shot up out of site.when it got out of site it caused some kind of flash anamoaly.i have pics im sending tried to catch the whole loop but couldnt.the skycam is ran by the nbc station wmbf.
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Myrtle Beach
There were no other sightings in Myrtle Beach on or around May 26th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
